name: 2-methylpropanoyl-CoA:enzyme N6-(dihydrolipoyl)lysine S-(2-methylpropanoyl)transferase
comment: 3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase complexes:dihydrolipoyllysine-residue (2-methylpropanoyl)transferase a part of multi-step reaction (see R01701+R02662+R07618, possibly identical to R01210) following after R01701
